pages.title: Base Essences
pages.text: You may have noticed that spells have a chance to drop some $(key)base essences$() when they $(bold)hit$().$(br2)$(key)Base essences$() are important materials on a mage's journey. They are used to craft magical items such as $(mage/book)spell books$(), $(mage/rune)runes$(), and $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$().

$(br)The drop chance for $(key)base essences$() is $(bold)20%$(). Each $(mechanic/loot_charm)Looting Charm$() you wear increases it by $(bold)10%$().$(br2)When the target's $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility level$() is above $(bold)160$(), it has a chance to drop $(bold)Intermediate$() essences.$(br2)When the target's $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility level$() is above $(bold)560$(), it has a chance to drop $(bold)Advanced$() essences.

pages.title: Enchanted Essence
pages.text: $(key)Enchanted Essence$() infuses an item with magic, boosting some attributes.$(br2)Each use increases the item's $(bold)enchant level$() by one.$(br2)It only works when its $(bold)threshold$() is at least the item's $(bold)enchant level$().

$(br)How to obtain:$(br)$(list)$(bold)Base essences$() (Primary/Intermediate/Advanced) craft $(key)Enchanted Essence$() with $(bold)thresholds$() of $(bold)10/20/30$() respectively.$(br)$(list)Looted $(key)Enchanted Essence$() max $(bold)threshold$() depends on your $(mechanic/hostility)Hostility difficulty level$().$(br)$(list)In $(mechanic/difficulty_tier#nightmare)Nightmare$(), you can $(bold)merge$() $(key)Enchanted Essence$() to obtain higher-$(bold)threshold$() essences.

pages.title: Enlightening Essence
pages.text: $(key)Enlightening Essence$() is similar to $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$(). The difference is that $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() affects $(bold)items$(), while $(key)Enlightening Essence$() affects the mage $(bold)directly$() and is not limited by a $(bold)threshold$().$(br2)$(key)Enlightening Essence$() cannot be crafted; it can only be obtained from loot.

pages.title: Mending Essence
pages.text: $(key)Mending Essence$() fully repairs an item and removes its accumulated $(bold)repair cost$().$(br2)$(key)Mending Essence$() can be crafted or obtained from loot.

pages.title: Disenchanted Essence
pages.text: $(key)Disenchanted Essence$() can $(bold)transfer$() all the magic infused into an item by $(mage/essence#ec)Enchanted Essence$() to another item.$(br2)$(key)Disenchanted Essence$() can be crafted, or purchased from Goblin Traders.
